To to cross-referring a hand-made table like this:

   $\boldsymbol m_{ij}$   $Pr(z_{ij} = 0)$   $Pr(z_{ij} = 1)$   $Pr(z_{ij} = 2)$     
  ---------------------- ------------------ ------------------ ------------------ 
    (2, 0, 0)              1                  0                  0             
    (1, 1, 0)             0.5                0.5                 0             
    (1, 0, 1)              0                  1                  0             
    (0, 2, 0)              0.25               0.5                0.25           
    (0, 1, 1)               0                 0.5                0.5            
    (0, 0, 2)              0                  0                  1  

Table: (\#tab:label) table name

use `\@ref(tab:label)`to refer the table \@ref(tab:label).
